mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, MSG_MAP_ID, MSG_MAP_LNM, MSG_MAP_PNM, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, STD_ERR_MSG_ID, ERR_CD, ISD_ERR_CAS_CTS, OSD_ERR_CAS_CTS, DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, CD_VAL_ID, CD_VAL, CD_VAL_NM, ISTT_US_IMPO_YN, RPST_ERCD_YN
mapper.insert: insert into WAQ_ERR_MSG_MAP (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, MSG_MAP_ID, MSG_MAP_LNM, MSG_MAP_PNM, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, STD_ERR_MSG_ID, ERR_CD, ISD_ERR_CAS_CTS, OSD_ERR_CAS_CTS, DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, CD_VAL_ID, CD_VAL, CD_VAL_NM, ISTT_US_IMPO_YN, RPST_ERCD_YN) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{msgMapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgMapLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgMapPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stdErrMsgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdErrCasCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{osdErrCasCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdValId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdValNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isttUsImpoYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rpstErcdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT COALESCE(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAQ_ERR_MSG_MAP WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}
insert into WAQ_ERR_MSG_MAP
RQST_NO,
RQST_SNO,
MSG_MAP_ID,
MSG_MAP_LNM,
MSG_MAP_PNM,
RQST_DCD,
RVW_STS_CD,
RVW_CONTS,
VRF_CD,
VRF_RMK,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,
STD_ERR_MSG_ID,
ERR_CD,
ISD_ERR_CAS_CTS,
OSD_ERR_CAS_CTS,
DMN_ID,
DMN_LNM,
DMN_PNM,
CD_VAL_ID,
CD_VAL,
CD_VAL_NM,
ISTT_US_IMPO_YN,
RPST_ERCD_YN,
#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{msgMapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{msgMapLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{msgMapPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
1,
#{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOW(),
#{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stdErrMsgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{errCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isdErrCasCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{osdErrCasCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cdValId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{rpstErcdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update WAQ_ERR_MSG_MAP
MSG_MAP_ID = #{msgMapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSG_MAP_LNM = #{msgMapLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSG_MAP_PNM = #{msgMapPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STD_ERR_MSG_ID = #{stdErrMsgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERR_CD = #{errCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISD_ERR_CAS_CTS = #{isdErrCasCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OSD_ERR_CAS_CTS = #{osdErrCasCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_PNM = #{dmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CD_VAL_ID = #{cdValId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CD_VAL = #{cdVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CD_VAL_NM = #{cdValNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISTT_US_IMPO_YN = #{isttUsImpoYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RPST_ERCD_YN = #{rpstErcdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WAQ_ERR_MSG_MAP set MSG_MAP_ID = #{msgMapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MSG_MAP_LNM = #{msgMapLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MSG_MAP_PNM = #{msgMapPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STD_ERR_MSG_ID = #{stdErrMsgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERR_CD = #{errCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISD_ERR_CAS_CTS = #{isdErrCasCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OSD_ERR_CAS_CTS = #{osdErrCasCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_PNM = #{dmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CD_VAL_ID = #{cdValId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CD_VAL = #{cdVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CD_VAL_NM = #{cdValNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISTT_US_IMPO_YN = #{isttUsImpoYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPST_ERCD_YN = #{rpstErcdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.MSG_MAP_ID, A.MSG_MAP_LNM, A.MSG_MAP_PNM, A.RQST_DCD, A.RVW_CONTS, A.VRF_RMK, A.VRF_CD, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
, CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' END AS FontColor , U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , A.STD_ERR_MSG_ID, A.ERR_CD, A.ISD_ERR_CAS_CTS, A.OSD_ERR_CAS_CTS, A.DMN_ID, A.DMN_LNM, A.DMN_PNM, A.CD_VAL_ID, A.CD_VAL, A.CD_VAL_NM, A.ISTT_US_IMPO_YN, A.RPST_ERCD_YN FROM WAQ_ERR_MSG_MAP A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO
mapper.update: UPDATE WAQ_ERR_MSG_MAP A SET A.REG_TYP_CD = (SELECT CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN MAX(B.MSG_MAP_ID ) IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END FROM WAM_ERR_MSG_MAP B WHERE B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') --AND B.MSG_MAP_ID = A.MSG_MAP_ID AND CASE WHEN A.MSG_MAP_ID IS NULL THEN A.ERR_CD ELSE A.MSG_MAP_ID END = CASE WHEN A.MSG_MAP_ID IS NULL THEN B.ERR_CD ELSE B.MSG_MAP_ID END ) ,A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: --검증쿼리 : 등록요청 중인 메시지 존재....(MS012) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WAQ_ERR_MSG_MAP D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO WHERE E.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND A.ERR_CD = D.ERR_CD AND A.DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID AND A.CD_VAL_ID = D.CD_VAL_ID AND COALESCE(D.RVW_STS_CD, 0) != '2' )

--검증쿼리 메시지코드 중복 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_ERR_MSG_MAP D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.ERR_CD = D.ERR_CD AND A.DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID AND A.CD_VAL_ID = D.CD_VAL_ID
AND A.RQST_SNO != D.RQST_SNO)

--검증쿼리 존재하지 않는 메시지 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_ERR_MSG_MAP D WHERE A.ERR_CD = D.ERR_CD AND A.DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID AND A.CD_VAL_ID = D.CD_VAL_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U'))
--검증쿼리 MS003 길이체크 (8) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND LENGTH(A.ERR_CD) != 9

--검증쿼리 AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_ERR_MSG_MAP D WHERE A.ERR_CD = D.ERR_CD AND COALESCE(A.DMN_ID , '_') = COALESCE(D.DMN_ID , '_') AND COALESCE(A.CD_VAL_ID , '_') = COALESCE(D.CD_VAL_ID , '_') AND COALESCE(A.STD_ERR_MSG_ID , '_') = COALESCE(D.STD_ERR_MSG_ID , '_') AND COALESCE(A.ISD_ERR_CAS_CTS, '_') = COALESCE(D.ISD_ERR_CAS_CTS , '_') AND COALESCE(A.OSD_ERR_CAS_CTS, '_') = COALESCE(D.OSD_ERR_CAS_CTS , '_') AND COALESCE(A.DMN_LNM, '_') = COALESCE(D.DMN_LNM , '_') AND COALESCE(A.DMN_PNM, '_') = COALESCE(D.DMN_PNM , '_') AND COALESCE(A.CD_VAL, '_') = COALESCE(D.CD_VAL , '_') AND COALESCE(A.CD_VAL_NM, '_') = COALESCE(D.CD_VAL_NM , '_') AND COALESCE(A.ISTT_US_IMPO_YN, '_') = COALESCE(D.ISTT_US_IMPO_YN , '_') AND COALESCE(A.RPST_ERCD_YN, '_') = COALESCE(D.RPST_ERCD_YN , '_') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') )
mapper.update:
UPDATE WAQ_ERR_MSG_MAP
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd} , RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = NOW() , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND COALESCE(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'
mapper.sql: MSG_MAP_LNM, MSG_MAP_PNM, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, STD_ERR_MSG_ID, ERR_CD, ISD_ERR_CAS_CTS, OSD_ERR_CAS_CTS, DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, CD_VAL_ID, CD_VAL, CD_VAL_NM, ISTT_US_IMPO_YN, RPST_ERCD_YN
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WAQ_ERR_MSG_MAP WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update: --WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_ERR_MSG_MAP A SET (MSG_MAP_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.MSG_MAP_ID AS MSG_MAP_ID , COALESCE(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_ERR_MSG_MAP B WHERE B.ERR_CD = A.ERR_CD AND B.DMN_ID = A.DMN_ID AND B.CD_VAL_ID = A.CD_VAL_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} --AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_ERR_MSG_MAP B WHERE B.ERR_CD = A.ERR_CD AND B.DMN_ID = A.DMN_ID AND B.CD_VAL_ID = A.CD_VAL_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )
mapper.delete: --WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_ERR_MSG_MAP A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_ERR_MSG_MAP B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.ERR_CD = A.ERR_CD AND B.DMN_ID = A.DMN_ID AND B.CD_VAL_ID = A.CD_VAL_ID )
mapper.insert:
--WAM 추가 (WAQ 내용을 추가, REG_TYP_CD 가 신규,변경일 경우) INSERT INTO WAM_ERR_MSG_MAP SELECT A.MSG_MAP_ID,
FROM WAQ_ERR_MSG_MAP A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
mapper.update: --WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WAH_ERR_MSG_MAP A SET EXP_DTM = NOW() WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_ERR_MSG_MAP B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.ERR_CD = A.ERR_CD AND B.DMN_ID = A.DMN_ID AND B.CD_VAL_ID = A.CD_VAL_ID ) AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert:
--WAH이력 적재... INSERT INTO WAH_ERR_MSG_MAP SELECT A.MSG_MAP_ID , TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXP_DTM , NOW() AS STR_DTM ,
FROM WAQ_ERR_MSG_MAP A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
